title: Presentation Skill Improvement Project for Professional Competency Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Basic presentation experience and understanding of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based collaborative presentation tasks for medical/legal/technical professionals, reflecting real-world job scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can establish a personalized presentation competency development plan using goal-setting and self-assessment tools within six months.
Learners can enhance their ability to structure content by delivering a 15-minute job-related presentation incorporating peer feedback at the 3-month mark.
Learners achieve a self-efficacy score of 4.0/5.0 or higher in three types of presentations (self-introduction, specialty explanation, persuasive decision-making) by the course conclusion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
